snippet: The rookie running back David Wilson could be tempting fate by celebrating his touchdowns with back flips, like he did three times against the Saints last Sunday.
abstract: Several members of the New York Giants are concerned that rookie running back David Wilson is tempting fate with his back-flip touchdown celebration.
lead_paragraph: The rookie running back David Wilson could be tempting fate by celebrating his touchdowns with back flips, like he did three times against the Saints last Sunday.

headline.seo: Giants Seek a More Grounded Celebration for David Wilson
headline.main: Giants Seek a More Grounded Celebration
headline.print_headline: Giants Seek A More Grounded Celebration
